actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide additional annual leave to certain employees for discharge of their duties as elected officials of municipalities, if not in violation of prohibited political activities laws applicable to Federal employees.

summary.text: Authorizes ten days of additional annual leave to employees for discharge of their duties as elected officals of municipalities, if not in violation of prohibited political activities laws applicable to Federal employees. Directs the Civil Service Commission to prescribe regulations governing approval of the use of such additional leave (Adds 5 U.S.C. 6327)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide additional annual leave to certain employees for discharge of their duties as elected officials of municipalities, if not in violation of prohibited political activities laws applicable to Federal employees.
